product_name: CetaphilDaily Oil Free Facial Moisturizer SPF 35
summary: SummaryHighlightsHSA/FSA eligibleCETAPHIL Daily Facial Moisturizer SPF 35 is a lightweight and fast absorbing moisturizer designed to hydrate sensitive combination skin for 24 hours. Broad spectrum SPF 35 protects against the sun's damaging UVA and UVB rays to keep skin looking young and vibrant.
details: DetailsBenefitsThree-in-one facial moisturizer hydrates, nourishes and protects sensitive, combination skinBroad spectrum SPF 35 protects against damaging UVA and UVB raysEdelweiss flower extract nourishes to repair the skinâ€™s barrierContains ProVitamin B5 to soothe sensitive skin while a unique blend of antioxidants prevent damage from surface free radicalsNon-greasy, fragrance free and paraben free formula won't clog poresDEFENDS AGAINST 5 SIGNS OF SKIN SENSITIVITY: Dryness, irritation, roughness, tightness and a weakened skin barrierDERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED for Sensitive SkinKey IngredientsGlycerin hydrates and moisturizes the skin, improving the skin barrier, and promoting overall skin healthPanthenol (vitamin B5) to hydrate, soothe and preserve the skin barrierNiacinamide (vitamin B3) to help smooth skin's texture and retain skin's moisture barrierEdelweiss Flower Extract to nourish and repair the skin's barrierAvobenzone 2.8%Homosalate 9.5%Octisalate 4.8%Octocrylene 7%Formulated WithoutFragranceOilParabensHypoallergenicWon't clog poresItem 2586964How To UseApply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Use a water resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating. Reapply at least every 2 hours. Children under 6 months of age: Ask a doctor. Sun Protection Measures. Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with aBroad Spectrum SPF value of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including: Limit time in the sun, especially from 10 am -2 pm. Wear long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats, and sunglassesPrecautions: For external use only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove. Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.IngredientsActive Ingredients: Avobenzone 2.8%, Homosalate 9.5%, Octisalate 4.8%, Octocrylene 7.0%.Inactive Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycole, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Ethylhexyl Methoxycrylene, Isopropyl Palmitate, Silica, Niacinamide, Cetearyl Olivate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Sorbitan Olivate, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E Acetate), Caprylyl Glycol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Palmitic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Leontopodium Alpinum (Edelweiss) Extract, Stearic Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Lees Extract, Propanediol, Sodium Hydroxide, Adenosine, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Myristic Acid, Buddleja Davidii (Summer Lilac) Leaf Extract, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Leaf Extract, Tocopherol(Vitamin E).
how_to_use: Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Use a water resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating. Reapply at least every 2 hours. Children under 6 months of age: Ask a doctor. Sun Protection Measures. Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with aBroad Spectrum SPF value of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including: Limit time in the sun, especially from 10 am -2 pm. Wear long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats, and sunglassesPrecautions: For external use only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove. Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.

reviews.headline: I wish it came in a different bottle
reviews.comments: Love this product, its perfect for a quick moisturizer w/ spf. This is my go to for days im staying inside or dont need a ton of spf. The pump will not get all the product out. When there is about 25% left you have to unscrew the lid and tap/pound the rest out ðŸ˜•

reviews.headline: Good product but poor pump
reviews.comments: I tried this product because I was looking for a good moisturizer/sunscreen combo for the face. Overall the product was great. It did not leave a white hue to my light skin-tone face or to my tan skin-tone friend's face like other sunscreens do. I was out in the sun a lot and my face remained sunburn-free. My only complaint is the pump that dispenses the product. The first time I bought this, the pump simply would not work and I had to unscrew the cap and squeeze out the product. I bought the product another time and occasionally had similar issues with the pump.

reviews.headline: Not for oily skin
reviews.comments: This would probably work for someone with normal skin but definitely not oily / combo skin. It suffocates my pores and instantly causes me to start sweating. It doesn't wear well under makeup up, at least for me, due to the sweating.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Needs a better bottle

reviews.headline: My Favorite
reviews.comments: This is my favorite moisturizer. It makes my skin feel soft and nourished without feeling like theres a layer on top of my skin, and it does not feel greasy at all. Plumps skin too.

reviews.headline: Too thick
reviews.comments: As soon as i put it on i start sweating it all off immediately. My skin cant breathe because its very thick. Maybe better for those with tighter pores

reviews.headline: dont waste your money
reviews.comments: It good but first of all, it is only 35 spf. Do not get anything thats not over 50 spf.

reviews.headline: Please put this in a better squeeze tube
reviews.comments:
This is my favorite moisturizer. I use it after washing my face and before putting on my makeup. 
I do not like the bottle it comes in. Theres so much wasted lotion at the bottom thats hard to get to unless I cut upen the bottleâ€” and its a think bottle, which is difficult and dangerous to cutâ€¦ 
I hope someday this lotion will come in a better sqeeze tube bottle similar to the cereve 50spf facial moisturizer squeeze tube/pump container.

reviews.headline: Thickness
reviews.comments: Lotion is too thick that it doesnt come out through the pump.

reviews.headline: Too thick
reviews.comments: I did not like the smell or consistency of this product.

reviews.headline: Holy grail American sunscreen
reviews.comments:
The most hydrating sunscreen with no white cast 
Like all chemical sunscreens, it burns my eyes, but worth it for the rest of the face

reviews.headline: Not my favorite
reviews.comments: Got this because it says it is oil free but goes on heavy.  I know that it is highly recommended but I don't like it and it makes my skin kind of greasy...

reviews.headline: Good, but not for sensitive eyes
reviews.comments: I picked this up at the recommendation of my dermatologist and I really, really wanted to love this, but it unfortunately stings my eyes like crazy. I can't put this anywhere near my eyes or they burn and water like crazy. It's unfortunate because this checks all my other boxes. Moisturizing, works well with retinols/retinoids, inexpensive, good packing, didn't irritate my eczema/make me break out, etc. If you don't have sensitive eyes, this would probably be great for you.

reviews.headline: I would buy, but...
reviews.comments: First time trying this product, previously used Cetaphil Oil-Absorbing moisturizer. Consistency is good (creamy texture); no white cast. Giving it 4-stars because the pump is horrible and I've had to remove pump to get product out.

reviews.headline: Good, not great
reviews.comments: I love the product for the convenience of having moisturizer and sunscreen in one bottle, but it comes at a cost that has me not using it as often as I otherwise would. First, it remains pretty visible on skin - no white cast, but it does leave me looking visibly greasy in a way that other moisturizers and even some sunscreen doesn't. This is a non-issue if I am wearing makeup over it, but having to put makeup on takes away from the convenience. The other issue is that it starts coming off my face after 12-16 hours of being on. Once it hits that point, it inevitably ends up stinging my eyes. As long as I put it on late in the morning and wash my face as soon as I get home from work, it is fine but if that is not an option I find myself reaching for something else.

reviews.headline: Great product for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I bought this product and found that my skin felt Hester after only one use.

reviews.headline: Love It
reviews.comments: I was looking for a new SPF and this had good enough reviews to give it a try. I absolutely love it. I have oily skin and this combined with a finishing powder leaves me oil free all day. It doesn't sting my eyes or cause my makeup to slip either.

reviews.headline: Broke me out badly
reviews.comments: If you have combination to oily skin, I would not recommend this product. It broke me out badly.

reviews.headline: Not the best
reviews.comments: Heavy ans greasy spf, skins feels like it can't breathe

reviews.headline: Easy to Apply but Extremely Greasy
reviews.comments: Bought this in hopes that I would find a daily moisturizer and sunscreen combo that wouldn't leave an oil slick on my face. This worked as a sunscreen but has me super greasy 40 minutes after application and also caused some redness.

faceoff_positive.comments: I was referred to this product at ulta beauty after I had returned a previous primer for breaking me out. I decided to give this product a go since the consultant I seen referred me and my skin issues to it. she said it would help me. I have combination skin, some days I'm oily and some days I am very dry with flaky patchy skin, and sometimes I have both oily and dry skin. i do have sensitive skin so basically anything I've tried broke me out snd so I was afraid of that with this product. But I gave it a go and since using this product, I have notice a significant difference from it. my skin is no longer very dry or oily. it feels smooth. no peeling of dry skin patches anymore!!!! I can't tell you how good this feels. I absolutely love this product,  and since it's doing so well for me so far,  I've decided to use their cleansers as well. which I will give my reviews on after using them after awhile.   I have also been using micellar water as well to help clean my face. These 2 products have been good to me so far.  â˜º
faceoff_positive.headline: WOW!!!! What kind of magic is this?

faceoff_negative.comments: I love the product for the convenience of having moisturizer and sunscreen in one bottle, but it comes at a cost that has me not using it as often as I otherwise would. First, it remains pretty visible on skin - no white cast, but it does leave me looking visibly greasy in a way that other moisturizers and even some sunscreen doesn't. This is a non-issue if I am wearing makeup over it, but having to put makeup on takes away from the convenience. The other issue is that it starts coming off my face after 12-16 hours of being on. Once it hits that point, it inevitably ends up stinging my eyes. As long as I put it on late in the morning and wash my face as soon as I get home from work, it is fine but if that is not an option I find myself reaching for something else.
faceoff_negative.headline: Good, not great

rollup.name: Daily Oil Free Facial Moisturizer SPF 35
